alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 21 at 10:39AM EST until further notice by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Kankakee River at Dunns Bridge affecting Jasper and Porter Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kankakee River at Shelby affecting Lake IN and Newton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kankakee River from US-421 south of La Crosse downstream to IN-49 south of Kouts, including the Dunns Bridge gauge. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding begins of low lying agricultural areas near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow and continue rising to a crest near 11.0 feet by Friday. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: These forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well as forecast precipitation 48 hours into the future. Changes to the rainfall forecast, or any additional rainfall after 48 hours, may cause changes to these river forecasts. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/Chicago and water.weather.gov The next statement is expected tonight.
